ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: How many times in a normal week do you engage in pre-planned physical activity?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-2 times; 2= 3-4 times; 3= 5-6 times; 4= 7 or more times; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: How long have you been engaging in pre-planned physical activity at this weekly rate?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me; 1= Less than 1 month; 2= 1-3 months; 3= 4-6 months; 4= More than 7 months; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: In general, what is the duration of each session of pre-planned physical activity that you engage in?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me; 1= Less than 10 minutes; 2= 10-20 minutes; 3= 21-30 minutes; 4= More than 30 minutes; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: If you add together each session of pre- planned physical activity that you engage in during a normal week, how much time would you estimate that you spend in total?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me; 1= Less than 1 hour; 2= 1-2 hours; 3= 3-5 hours; 4= More than 5 hours; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: In the past, how long have you generally persisted with a pre-planned physical activity program before giving up?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me, as I have never persisted; 1= Up to 1 month; 2= Up to 3 months; 3= Up to 6 months; 4= More than 6 months, or I have never given up; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: How vigorously do you engage in pre- planned physical activity?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me; 1= Very light (hardly out of breath); 2= Moderately hard; 3= Hard; 4= Very hard (breathing deeply); 9= Missing

ElementDescription: Excluding your pre-planned physical activity sessions, how many hours do you estimate that you spend doing other forms of physical activity each week?
Notes: 0= Fewer than 2 hours; 1= 2-4 hours; 2= 5-7 hours; 3= 8-9 hours; 4= 10 or more hours; 9= Missing

ElementDescription: How vigorously do you engage in these other forms of physical activity?
Notes: 0= Not relevant to me; 1= Very light (hardly out of breath); 2= Moderately hard; 3= Hard; 4= Very hard (breathing deeply); 9= Missing

ElementDescription: In general, how physically demanding are your job or your day-to-day activities?
Notes: 0= Not at all (activities are sedentary without requiring much movement); 1= A little; 2= Moderately; 3= Quite; 4= Highly (engaged in heavy labor or constantly moving around); 9= Missing

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Walking/Hiking
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Jogging/Running
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Dancing
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Yoga
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Rowing
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Swimming
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Weight-training
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Cycling
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Step Machine
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Aerobics/Steps
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. None
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Other
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes

ElementDescription: Which of these types of physical activity do you enjoy participating in? Click as many as appropriate. Other (please specify below)
Number of different physical activities (sum of items blpaq_walk through blpaq_other)
BLPAQ - Planned Physical Activity subscore
Notes: Average of non-missing items blpaq_1 through blpaq_6

ElementDescription: BLPAQ - Unplanned Physical Activity subscore
Notes: Average of non-missing items blpaq_7 through blpaq_9
